statements.statement: select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT order by PHAUTHUAT_ID

select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT
TT_PHAUTHUAT.PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.SOPHIEUPHAUTHUAT = '$SOPHIEUPHAUTHUAT$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.LOAI = '$LOAI$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'

TT_PHAUTHUAT.ICD_VAOKHOA_MOTA = '$ICD_VAOKHOA_MOTA$'

TT_PHAUTHUAT.NHOMDICHVU_ID = '$NHOMDICHVU_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.DICHVU_ID = '$DICHVU_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.PHUONGPHAPVOCAM_ID = '$PHUONGPHAPVOCAM_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.TAIBIEN_ID = '$TAIBIEN_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.CHEDO_ID = '$CHEDO_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.TUVONG_ID = '$TUVONG_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.TRINHTUTHUCHIEN = '$TRINHTUTHUCHIEN$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.MOTA = '$MOTA$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.KETQUA = '$KETQUA$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.BENHNHANBENNGOAI = '$BENHNHANBENNGOAI$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.NGUONBENH_ID = '$NGUONBENH_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.LOAIPHAUTHUAT = '$LOAIPHAUTHUAT$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.DANLUU = '$DANLUU$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.NGAYRUT = '$NGAYRUT$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.NGAYCATCHI = '$NGAYCATCHI$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.KHAC = '$KHAC$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.SOLANMOLAI = '$SOLANMOLAI$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.LYDOMOLAI = '$LYDOMOLAI$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.CANTHIEPPHAUTHUAT = '$CANTHIEPPHAUTHUAT$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.TUDIENKETQUA_ID = '$TUDIENKETQUA_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.PHONGBANCHIDINH_ID = '$PHONGBANCHIDINH_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.PPMO_ID = '$PPMO_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.THOIGIANGAYME = '$THOIGIANGAYME$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.KHOADULIEU = '$KHOADULIEU$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.NGUOIKHOA_ID = '$NGUOIKHOA_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.TENNGUOIKHOA = '$TENNGUOIKHOA$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.NGAYKHOADULIEU = '$NGAYKHOADULIEU$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.THOIGIANKHOADULIEU = '$THOIGIANKHOADULIEU$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by PHAUTHUAT_ID DESC
select PT.*, TN.BENHNHAN_ID from TT_PHAUTHUAT PT, TT_TIEPNHAN TN where PT.TIEPNHAN_ID = TN.TIEPNHAN_ID AND PHAUTHUAT_ID = $PHAUTHUAT_ID$
select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT where TT_PHAUTHUAT.PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$' order by PHAUTHUAT_ID
statements.insert:
select TT_PHAUTHUAT_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_PHAUTHUAT ( PHAUTHUAT_ID , SOPHIEUPHAUTHUAT , LOAI , BENHAN_ID , LUUTRU_ID , TIEPNHAN_ID , PHONGBANTHUCHIEN_ID , NGAYTHUCHIEN , THOIGIANBATDAU , THOIGIANKETTHUC , ICD_VAOKHOA , ICD_VAOKHOA_MOTA , ICD_TRUOCPHAUTHUAT , ICD_TRUOCPHAUTHUAT_MOTA , ICD_SAUPHAUTHUAT , ICD_SAUPHAUTHUAT_MOTA , NHOMDICHVU_ID , DICHVU_ID , PHUONGPHAPVOCAM_ID , TAIBIEN_ID , CHEDO_ID , TUVONG_ID , TRINHTUTHUCHIEN , MOTA , KETQUA , BENHNHANBENNGOAI , NGUONBENH_ID , LOAIPHAUTHUAT , DANLUU , NGAYRUT , NGAYCATCHI , KHAC , SOLANMOLAI , LYDOMOLAI , CANTHIEPPHAUTHUAT , TUDIENKETQUA_ID , PHONGBANCHIDINH_ID , PPMO_ID , THOIGIANGAYME , KHOADULIEU , NGUOIKHOA_ID , TENNGUOIKHOA , NGAYKHOADULIEU , THOIGIANKHOADULIEU , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# ,#SOPHIEUPHAUTHUAT# , #LOAI# , #BENHAN_ID# , #LUUTRU_ID# , #TIEPNHAN_ID# , #PHONGBANTHUCHIEN_ID# , #NGAYTHUCHIEN# , #THOIGIANBATDAU# , #THOIGIANKETTHUC# , #ICD_VAOKHOA# , #ICD_VAOKHOA_MOTA# , #ICD_TRUOCPHAUTHUAT# , #ICD_TRUOCPHAUTHUAT_MOTA# , #ICD_SAUPHAUTHUAT# , #ICD_SAUPHAUTHUAT_MOTA# , #NHOMDICHVU_ID# , #DICHVU_ID# , #PHUONGPHAPVOCAM_ID# , #TAIBIEN_ID# , #CHEDO_ID# , #TUVONG_ID# , #TRINHTUTHUCHIEN# , #MOTA# , #KETQUA# , #BENHNHANBENNGOAI# , #NGUONBENH_ID# , #LOAIPHAUTHUAT# , #DANLUU# , #NGAYRUT# , #NGAYCATCHI# , #KHAC# , #SOLANMOLAI# , #LYDOMOLAI# , #CANTHIEPPHAUTHUAT# , #TUDIENKETQUA_ID# , #PHONGBANCHIDINH_ID# , #PPMO_ID# , #THOIGIANGAYME# , #KHOADULIEU# , #NGUOIKHOA_ID# , #TENNGUOIKHOA# , #NGAYKHOADULIEU# , #THOIGIANKHOADULIEU# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.statement: select KHOADULIEU, NGAYKHOADULIEU, THOIGIANKHOADULIEU, NGUOIKHOA_ID from TT_PHAUTHUAT where PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'
statements.update: update TT_PHAUTHUAT set SOPHIEUPHAUTHUAT = #SOPHIEUPHAUTHUAT# , LOAI = #LOAI# , BENHAN_ID = #BENHAN_ID# , LUUTRU_ID = #LUUTRU_ID# , TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID# , PHONGBANTHUCHIEN_ID = #PHONGBANTHUCHIEN_ID# , NGAYTHUCHIEN = #NGAYTHUCHIEN# , THOIGIANBATDAU = #THOIGIANBATDAU# , THOIGIANKETTHUC = #THOIGIANKETTHUC# , ICD_VAOKHOA = #ICD_VAOKHOA# , ICD_VAOKHOA_MOTA = #ICD_VAOKHOA_MOTA# , ICD_TRUOCPHAUTHUAT = #ICD_TRUOCPHAUTHUAT# , ICD_TRUOCPHAUTHUAT_MOTA = #ICD_TRUOCPHAUTHUAT_MOTA# , ICD_SAUPHAUTHUAT = #ICD_SAUPHAUTHUAT# , ICD_SAUPHAUTHUAT_MOTA = #ICD_SAUPHAUTHUAT_MOTA# , NHOMDICHVU_ID = #NHOMDICHVU_ID# , DICHVU_ID = #DICHVU_ID# , PHUONGPHAPVOCAM_ID = #PHUONGPHAPVOCAM_ID# , TAIBIEN_ID = #TAIBIEN_ID# , CHEDO_ID = #CHEDO_ID# , TUVONG_ID = #TUVONG_ID# , TRINHTUTHUCHIEN = #TRINHTUTHUCHIEN# , MOTA = #MOTA# , KETQUA = #KETQUA# , BENHNHANBENNGOAI = #BENHNHANBENNGOAI# , NGUONBENH_ID = #NGUONBENH_ID# , LOAIPHAUTHUAT = #LOAIPHAUTHUAT# , DANLUU = #DANLUU# , NGAYRUT = #NGAYRUT# , NGAYCATCHI = #NGAYCATCHI# , KHAC = #KHAC# , SOLANMOLAI = #SOLANMOLAI# , LYDOMOLAI = #LYDOMOLAI# , CANTHIEPPHAUTHUAT = #CANTHIEPPHAUTHUAT# , TUDIENKETQUA_ID = #TUDIENKETQUA_ID# , PHONGBANCHIDINH_ID = #PHONGBANCHIDINH_ID# , PPMO_ID = #PPMO_ID# , THOIGIANGAYME = #THOIGIANGAYME# , KHOADULIEU = #KHOADULIEU# , NGUOIKHOA_ID = #NGUOIKHOA_ID# , TENNGUOIKHOA = #TENNGUOIKHOA# , NGAYKHOADULIEU = #NGAYKHOADULIEU# , THOIGIANKHOADULIEU = #THOIGIANKHOADULIEU# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TT_PHAUTHUAT where PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'

delete from TT_PHAUTHUAT
TT_PHAUTHUAT.PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.SOPHIEUPHAUTHUAT = '$SOPHIEUPHAUTHUAT$'

TT_PHAUTHUAT.MOTA = '$MOTA$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.KETQUA = '$KETQUA$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT.BENHNHANBENNGOAI = '$BENHNHANBENNGOAI$'

TT_PHAUTHUAT.NGAYCATCHI = '$NGAYCATCHI$'

TT_PHAUTHUAT.LYDOMOLAI = '$LYDOMOLAI$'

BEGIN update TT_DVYEUCAU set TRANGTHAI = #TRANGTHAI#, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#, NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where DVYEUCAU_ID = #DVYEUCAU_ID#; update TT_VIENPHI set DATHUCHIEN = '1', NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#, NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where VIENPHI_ID = #VIENPHI_ID#; END;
statements.insert: insert into TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU ( PHAUTHUAT_ID , DVYEUCAU_ID , NHOMDICHVU_ID , DICHVU_ID , LOAIGIA_ID , THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU , BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA , BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #PHAUTHUAT_ID# , #DVYEUCAU_ID# , #NHOMDICHVU_ID# , #DICHVU_ID# , #LOAIGIA_ID# , #THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU# , #BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA# , #BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update:
update TT_DVYEUCAU set TRANGTHAI = #TRANGTHAI# where BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID#
#LISTDVYEUCAU_ID[]#
statements.statement: select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU order by PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID

SELECT YC.PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID ,YC.PHAUTHUAT_ID ,YC.DVYEUCAU_ID ,YC.NHOMDICHVU_ID ,YC.DICHVU_ID ,YC.LOAIGIA_ID ,VP.BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA ,VP.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN ,VP.THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU ,YC.BENHVIEN_ID FROM TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU YC INNER JOIN TT_VIENPHI VP ON YC.DVYEUCAU_ID= VP.REF_ID AND VP.REF_TABLE ='TT_DVYEUCAU'
YC.PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID$'
YC.PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'
YC.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
YC.NHOMDICHVU_ID = '$NHOMDICHVU_ID$'
YC.DICHVU_ID = '$DICHVU_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU.LOAIGIA_ID = '$LOAIGIA_ID$'
VP.THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU = '$THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU$'
VP.BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = '$BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA$'
VP.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN = '$BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN$'
YC.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID
select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU where TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU.PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID = '$value$' order by PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID
select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU where TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU.PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID$' order by PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID
statements.update: update TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU set PHAUTHUAT_ID = #PHAUTHUAT_ID# , DVYEUCAU_ID = #DVYEUCAU_ID# , NHOMDICHVU_ID = #NHOMDICHVU_ID# , DICHVU_ID = #DICHVU_ID# , LOAIGIA_ID = #LOAIGIA_ID# , THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU = #THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU# , BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = #BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA# , BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN = #BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU where PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID$'

delete from TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU
TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU.PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU.PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU.NHOMDICHVU_ID = '$NHOMDICHVU_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU.DICHVU_ID = '$DICHVU_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU.LOAIGIA_ID = '$LOAIGIA_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU.THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU = '$THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU.BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = '$BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN = '$BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP order by PHAUTHUAT_EKIP_ID

select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.PHAUTHUAT_EKIP_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_EKIP_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.PTVC_ID = '$PTVC_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.PPT1_ID = '$PPT1_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.PPT2_ID = '$PPT2_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.GMC_ID = '$GMC_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.GMP_ID = '$GMP_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.DCVT_ID = '$DCVT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.DCVN_ID = '$DCVN_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.BSHC_ID = '$BSHC_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.BSTC_ID = '$BSTC_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by PHAUTHUAT_EKIP_ID
select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP where PHAUTHUAT_ID = $PHAUTHUAT_ID$
select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_PPVOCAM where PHAUTHUAT_ID = $PHAUTHUAT_ID$
select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP where TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.PHAUTHUAT_EKIP_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_EKIP_ID$' order by PHAUTHUAT_EKIP_ID
insert into TT_PHAUTHUAT_PPVOCAM ( PHAUTHUAT_ID, PPVOCAM_ID, BENHVIEN_ID) values ( #PHAUTHUAT_ID#, #PPVOCAM_ID#, #BENHVIEN_ID#)

insert into TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP ( PHAUTHUAT_ID
NHANVIEN_ID
VAITRO_ID
GHICHU
, PTVC_ID , PPT1_ID , PPT2_ID , GMC_ID , GMP_ID , DCVT_ID , DCVN_ID , BSHC_ID , BSTC_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #PHAUTHUAT_ID#
#NHANVIEN_ID#
#VAITRO_ID#
#GHICHU#
, #PTVC_ID# , #PPT1_ID# , #PPT2_ID# , #GMC_ID# , #GMP_ID# , #DCVT_ID# , #DCVN_ID# , #BSHC_ID# , #BSTC_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP set PHAUTHUAT_ID = #PHAUTHUAT_ID# , PTVC_ID = #PTVC_ID# , PPT1_ID = #PPT1_ID# , PPT2_ID = #PPT2_ID# , GMC_ID = #GMC_ID# , GMP_ID = #GMP_ID# , DCVT_ID = #DCVT_ID# , DCVN_ID = #DCVN_ID# , BSHC_ID = #BSHC_ID# , BSTC_ID = #BSTC_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where PHAUTHUAT_EKIP_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_EKIP_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP where PHAUTHUAT_EKIP_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_EKIP_ID$'

delete from TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.PHAUTHUAT_EKIP_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_EKIP_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.PTVC_ID = '$PTVC_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.PPT1_ID = '$PPT1_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.PPT2_ID = '$PPT2_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.GMC_ID = '$GMC_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.GMP_ID = '$GMP_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.DCVT_ID = '$DCVT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.DCVN_ID = '$DCVN_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.BSHC_ID = '$BSHC_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.BSTC_ID = '$BSTC_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_EKIP.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
delete from TT_PHAUTHUAT_PPVOCAM where PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'
select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES order by IMAGES_ID

select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.IMAGES_ID = '$IMAGES_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.FILE_NAME_ORIGIN = '$FILE_NAME_ORIGIN$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.FILE_NAME = '$FILE_NAME$'

TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by IMAGES_ID
select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES where TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.IMAGES_ID = '$value$' order by IMAGES_ID
select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES where TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.IMAGES_ID = '$IMAGES_ID$' order by IMAGES_ID
statements.insert:
select TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES ( IMAGES_ID , PHAUTHUAT_ID , FILE_NAME_ORIGIN , FILE_NAME , IDX , TENHINH , MOTAHINH , CHONINMACDINH , TAMNGUNG , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #PHAUTHUAT_ID# , #FILE_NAME_ORIGIN# , #FILE_NAME# , #IDX# , #TENHINH# , #MOTAHINH# , #CHONINMACDINH# , #TAMNGUNG# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update:
update TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES set PHAUTHUAT_ID = #PHAUTHUAT_ID# , FILE_NAME_ORIGIN = #FILE_NAME_ORIGIN# , FILE_NAME = #FILE_NAME# , IDX = #IDX# , TENHINH = #TENHINH# , MOTAHINH = #MOTAHINH# , CHONINMACDINH = #CHONINMACDINH# , TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG#
, NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where IMAGES_ID = '$IMAGES_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES where IMAGES_ID = '$IMAGES_ID$'

delete from TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.IMAGES_ID = '$IMAGES_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.FILE_NAME_ORIGIN = '$FILE_NAME_ORIGIN$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.FILE_NAME = '$FILE_NAME$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.IDX = '$IDX$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.TENHINH = '$TENHINH$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.MOTAHINH = '$MOTAHINH$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.CHONINMACDINH = '$CHONINMACDINH$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.TAMNGUNG = '$TAMNGUNG$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_IMAGES.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT (TK.KHODUOC_ID || '_' || TK.DUOC_ID || '_' || SLN.NGUONDUOC_ID) AS DUOC_KEY, TK.KHODUOC_ID, TK.DUOC_ID, GB.DONGIABAN, SLN.NGUONDUOC_ID as NGUONHANG_ID, PL.SOCHUNGTU AS SOPHIEULINH, CT.SOCHUNGTU AS SOPHIEUXUAT, CT.CHUNGTU_ID, TK.SOLUONG AS SOTON FROM TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU_SOLONHAP SLN, TT_DUOC_SOLONHAP_GIABAN GB, TT_DUOC_TONKHO TK, TT_DUOC_PHIEULINH PL, TT_DUOC_PHIEULINH_CHITIET PLCT, TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU CT, TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU_CHITIET CTCT WHERE CT.CHUNGTU_ID = CTCT.CHUNGTU_ID AND CT.MUCDICHCHUNGTU_ID = 1060 --XUAT SU DUNG AND CTCT.SOLONHAP_ID = TK.SOLONHAP_ID AND CTCT.DUOC_ID = TK.DUOC_ID AND PL.CHUNGTU_ID = PLCT.CHUNGTU_ID AND PLCT.DUOC_ID = TK.DUOC_ID AND PLCT.SOLONHAP_ID = TK.SOLONHAP_ID AND TK.KHODUOC_ID = $KHODUOC_ID$
#LIST_DUOC_ID[]#

SELECT PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU_ID FROM TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU PTYC WHERE BENHVIEN_ID ='$BENHVIEN_ID$'
#LISTDVYEUCAU_ID[]#

select CASE '$ACTION$' WHEN 'XOA' THEN CASE WHEN (SELECT count(*) FROM TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT WHERE PHAUTHUAT_ID='$PHAUTHUAT_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID='$BENHVIEN_ID$') > 0 THEN -1 WHEN (SELECT count(*) FROM TT_PHAUTHUAT WHERE PHAUTHUAT_ID='$PHAUTHUAT_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID='$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND KHOADULIEU='1') > 0 THEN -2 WHEN (SELECT count(*) FROM TT_PHAUTHUAT WHERE PHAUTHUAT_ID='$PHAUTHUAT_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID='$BENHVIEN_ID$') = 0 THEN -3 ELSE 1 END WHEN 'LUU' THEN CASE WHEN (SELECT count(*) FROM TT_PHAUTHUAT WHERE PHAUTHUAT_ID='$PHAUTHUAT_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID='$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND KHOADULIEU='1') = 0 THEN -2 ELSE 1 END ELSE 10 END as RESULT, CASE '$ACTION$' WHEN 'XOA' THEN CASE WHEN (SELECT count(*) FROM TT_PHAUTHUAT WHERE PHAUTHUAT_ID='$PHAUTHUAT_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID='$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND KHOADULIEU='1') > 0 THEN (SELECT NGUOIKHOA_ID FROM TT_PHAUTHUAT WHERE PHAUTHUAT_ID='$PHAUTHUAT_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID='$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND KHOADULIEU='1') ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END as NGUOIKHOA_ID from dual
select CASE WHEN (SELECT count(*) FROM TT_PHAUTHUAT WHERE PHAUTHUAT_ID='$PHAUTHUAT_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID='$BENHVIEN_ID$') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE -1 END as RESULT from dual

SELECT VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID, VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_ID, VTYT.NGAYSUDUNG, VTYT.TRANGTHAI_XEM, VTYT.NGUONGOCDULIEU, VTYT.NGUOITAO_ID, VTYT.NGAYTAO, VTYT.DUOC_ID, VTYT.SOLUONG, VTYT.KHOSUDUNG_ID AS KHODUOC_ID, VTYT.CHUNGTU_ID, VTYT.CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID, VTYT.NGUONHANG_ID, VTYT.TINHTIEN, VTYT.BNTUCHITRA, VTYT.GHICHU ,max(VP.DONGIA_DOANHTHU) AS DONGIABAN, sum(NVL(VP.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN,0)) BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN, sum(NVL(VP.THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU,0)) THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU, CT.MACHUNGTU AS SOPHIEUXUAT, PL.MACHUNGTU AS SOPHIEULINH FROM TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT VTYT left join TT_PHAUTHUAT PT on PT.PHAUTHUAT_ID = VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_ID left join TT_VIENPHI VP on VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID = VP.REF_ID and VP.REF_TABLE = 'TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT' left join TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU CT on VTYT.CHUNGTU_ID = CT.CHUNGTU_ID left join TT_DUOC_PHIEULINH PL on VTYT.CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID = PL.CHUNGTU_ID WHERE VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID = $PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID$ group by VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID, VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_ID, VTYT.NGAYSUDUNG, VTYT.TRANGTHAI_XEM, VTYT.NGUONGOCDULIEU, VTYT.NGUOITAO_ID, VTYT.NGAYTAO, VTYT.DUOC_ID, VTYT.SOLUONG, VTYT.KHOSUDUNG_ID , VTYT.CHUNGTU_ID, VTYT.CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID, VTYT.NGUONHANG_ID, VTYT.TINHTIEN, VTYT.BNTUCHITRA, VTYT.GHICHU, CT.MACHUNGTU , PL.MACHUNGTU

SELECT REF_TABLE,REF_ID ,B.DUOC_ID,B.BENHVIEN_ID,B.SOLUONG ,B.KHODUOC_ID, B.NGUONHANG_ID, B.NGUONHANG_ID AS NGUONDUOC_ID FROM TT_DUOC_TONKHO_BOOK_NGOAITRU B INNER JOIN TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT VT ON B.REF_ID=VT.PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID WHERE REF_TABLE='TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT' AND VT.PHAUTHUAT_ID='$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'AND B.BENHVIEN_ID='$BENHVIEN_ID$'

SELECT VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID, VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_ID, VTYT.NGAYSUDUNG, VTYT.TRANGTHAI_XEM, VTYT.NGUONGOCDULIEU, VTYT.NGUOITAO_ID, VTYT.NGAYTAO, VTYT.DUOC_ID, VTYT.SOLUONG, VTYT.KHOSUDUNG_ID AS KHODUOC_ID, VTYT.CHUNGTU_ID, VTYT.CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID, VTYT.NGUONHANG_ID, VTYT.TINHTIEN, VTYT.BNTUCHITRA, VTYT.COSO, VTYT.GHICHU ,max(VP.DONGIA_DOANHTHU) AS DONGIABAN, sum(NVL(VP.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN,0)) BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN, sum(NVL(VP.THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU,0)) THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU, TK.SOLUONG AS SOTON, CT.MACHUNGTU AS SOPHIEUXUAT, PL.MACHUNGTU AS SOPHIEULINH FROM TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT VTYT left join TT_PHAUTHUAT PT on PT.PHAUTHUAT_ID = VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_ID left join TT_VIENPHI VP on VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID = VP.REF_ID and VP.REF_TABLE = 'TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT' left join (select * from TT_DUOC_TONKHO where ROWNUM =1 order by DUOCTONKHO_ID desc) TK on TK.DUOC_ID = VTYT.DUOC_ID left join TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU CT on VTYT.CHUNGTU_ID = CT.CHUNGTU_ID left join TT_DUOC_PHIEULINH PL on VTYT.CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID = PL.CHUNGTU_ID WHERE PT.PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$' group by VTYT.COSO, VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID, VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_ID, VTYT.NGAYSUDUNG, VTYT.TRANGTHAI_XEM, VTYT.NGUONGOCDULIEU, VTYT.NGUOITAO_ID, VTYT.NGAYTAO, VTYT.DUOC_ID, VTYT.SOLUONG, VTYT.KHOSUDUNG_ID, VTYT.CHUNGTU_ID, VTYT.CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID, VTYT.NGUONHANG_ID, VTYT.TINHTIEN, VTYT.BNTUCHITRA, VTYT.GHICHU, TK.SOLUONG , CT.MACHUNGTU , PL.MACHUNGTU

SELECT TK.KHODUOC_ID, TK.DUOC_ID, TK.DONGIAMUA as DONGIABAN, TK.NGUONDUOC_ID as NGUONHANG_ID, SUM(TK.SOLUONG) AS TONKHO FROM TT_DUOC_TONKHO TK WHERE TK.KHODUOC_ID = $KHODUOC_ID$ AND TK.DUOC_ID = $DUOC_ID$ GROUP BY DUOC_ID, KHODUOC_ID, NGUONDUOC_ID, DONGIAMUA
select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT order by PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID

select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.CHUNGTU_ID = '$CHUNGTU_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID = '$CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.KHOSUDUNG_ID = '$KHOSUDUNG_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.TINHTIEN = '$TINHTIEN$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.BNTUCHITRA = '$BNTUCHITRA$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.NGAYSUDUNG = '$NGAYSUDUNG$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.NGUONHANG_ID = '$NGUONHANG_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.TRANGTHAI_XEM = '$TRANGTHAI_XEM$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.NGUONGOCDULIEU = '$NGUONGOCDULIEU$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID
select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT where TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID = '$value$' order by PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID
select * from TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT where TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID$' order by PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID
statements.insert:
select TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT ( PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID , PHAUTHUAT_ID , DUOC_ID , SOLUONG , CHUNGTU_ID , CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID , KHOSUDUNG_ID , KHOTAO_ID , TINHTIEN , BNTUCHITRA , NGAYSUDUNG , NGUONHANG_ID , TRANGTHAI_XEM , NGUONGOCDULIEU , GHICHU , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYTAO , BENHVIEN_ID , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT ) values ( #ID# , #PHAUTHUAT_ID# , #DUOC_ID# , #SOLUONG# , #CHUNGTU_ID# , #CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID# , #KHOSUDUNG_ID# , #KHOTAO_ID# , #TINHTIEN# , #BNTUCHITRA# , #NGAYSUDUNG# , #NGUONHANG_ID# , #TRANGTHAI_XEM# , #NGUONGOCDULIEU# , #GHICHU# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# )
statements.update:
update TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT set PHAUTHUAT_ID = #PHAUTHUAT_ID# , DUOC_ID = #DUOC_ID# , SOLUONG = #SOLUONG# , CHUNGTU_ID = #CHUNGTU_ID# , CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID = #CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID# , KHOSUDUNG_ID = #KHOSUDUNG_ID# , TINHTIEN = #TINHTIEN# , BNTUCHITRA = #BNTUCHITRA# , NGAYSUDUNG = #NGAYSUDUNG# , NGUONHANG_ID = #NGUONHANG_ID# , TRANGTHAI_XEM = #TRANGTHAI_XEM# , NGUONGOCDULIEU = #NGUONGOCDULIEU# , GHICHU = #GHICHU#
where PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT where PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID$'

delete from TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_VTYT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.PHAUTHUAT_ID = '$PHAUTHUAT_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.CHUNGTU_ID = '$CHUNGTU_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID = '$CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.KHOSUDUNG_ID = '$KHOSUDUNG_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.TINHTIEN = '$TINHTIEN$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.NGAYSUDUNG = '$NGAYSUDUNG$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.NGUONHANG_ID = '$NGUONHANG_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.TRANGTHAI_XEM = '$TRANGTHAI_XEM$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.NGUONGOCDULIEU = '$NGUONGOCDULIEU$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_PHAUTHUAT_VTYT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
select * from TT_VIENPHI order by VIENPHI_ID

select * from TT_VIENPHI
TT_VIENPHI.VIENPHI_ID = '$VIENPHI_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.REF_ID = '$REF_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.REF_TABLE = '$REF_TABLE$'
TT_VIENPHI.DICHVU_ID = '$DICHVU_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.LOAI_CHIPHI = '$LOAI_CHIPHI$'
TT_VIENPHI.LOAIGIA_ID = '$LOAIGIA_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.SOLUONG = '$SOLUONG$'
TT_VIENPHI.DONGIA_DOANHTHU = '$DONGIA_DOANHTHU$'
TT_VIENPHI.THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU = '$THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHYT_TL = '$BHYT_TL$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHYT_DONGIA = '$BHYT_DONGIA$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHYT_THANHTIEN = '$BHYT_THANHTIEN$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA = '$BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = '$BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA$'
TT_VIENPHI.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN = '$BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN$'
TT_VIENPHI.GIATRI_HOADON = '$GIATRI_HOADON$'
TT_VIENPHI.GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN = '$GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN$'
TT_VIENPHI.GIATRI_BIENLAI = '$GIATRI_BIENLAI$'
TT_VIENPHI.GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN = '$GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN$'
TT_VIENPHI.GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN = '$GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN$'
TT_VIENPHI.GIATRI_THATTHU = '$GIATRI_THATTHU$'
TT_VIENPHI.MIENGIAM_TL = '$MIENGIAM_TL$'
TT_VIENPHI.MIENGIAM_GIATRI = '$MIENGIAM_GIATRI$'
TT_VIENPHI.NGANSACH_TL = '$NGANSACH_TL$'
TT_VIENPHI.NGANSACH_GIATRI = '$NGANSACH_GIATRI$'
TT_VIENPHI.TAITRO_TL = '$TAITRO_TL$'
TT_VIENPHI.TAITRO_GIATRI = '$TAITRO_GIATRI$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHTN_TL = '$BHTN_TL$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHTN_DONGIA = '$BHTN_DONGIA$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHTN_THANHTIEN = '$BHTN_THANHTIEN$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA = '$BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = '$BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA$'
TT_VIENPHI.DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN = '$DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN$'
TT_VIENPHI.HUY = '$HUY$'
TT_VIENPHI.DATHANHTOAN = '$DATHANHTOAN$'
TT_VIENPHI.DATHUCHIEN = '$DATHUCHIEN$'
TT_VIENPHI.KHONGTHUTIEN = '$KHONGTHUTIEN$'
TT_VIENPHI.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.ACTIVE = '$ACTIVE$'
TT_VIENPHI.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TRUNC(TT_VIENPHI.NGAYTAO) = TRUNC(#NGAYTAO#)
TT_VIENPHI.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
TRUNC(TT_VIENPHI.NGAYCAPNHAT) = TRUNC(#NGAYCAPNHAT#)
order by VIENPHI_ID
select * from TT_VIENPHI where TT_VIENPHI.VIENPHI_ID = '$value$' order by VIENPHI_ID
select * from TT_VIENPHI where TT_VIENPHI.VIENPHI_ID = '$VIENPHI_ID$' order by VIENPHI_ID
statements.insert:
select TT_VIENPHI_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_VIENPHI ( VIENPHI_ID , TIEPNHAN_ID , BENHAN_ID , REF_ID , REF_TABLE , DICHVU_ID , DUOC_ID , LOAI_CHIPHI , LOAIGIA_ID , SOLUONG , DONGIA_DOANHTHU , THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU , BHYT_TL , BHYT_DONGIA , BHYT_THANHTIEN , BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA , BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA , BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN , GIATRI_HOADON , GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN , GIATRI_BIENLAI , GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN , GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN , GIATRI_THATTHU , MIENGIAM_TL , MIENGIAM_GIATRI , NGANSACH_TL , NGANSACH_GIATRI , TAITRO_TL , TAITRO_GIATRI , BHTN_TL , BHTN_DONGIA , BHTN_THANHTIEN , BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA , BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA , DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN , HUY , DATHANHTOAN , DATHUCHIEN , KHONGTHUTIEN , HOADON_ID , ACTIVE , BENHVIEN_ID , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT ) values ( #ID# , #TIEPNHAN_ID# , #BENHAN_ID# , #REF_ID# , #REF_TABLE# , #DICHVU_ID# , #DUOC_ID# , #LOAI_CHIPHI# , #LOAIGIA_ID# , #SOLUONG# , #DONGIA_DOANHTHU# , #THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU# , #BHYT_TL# , #BHYT_DONGIA# , #BHYT_THANHTIEN# , #BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA# , #BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA# , #BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN# , #GIATRI_HOADON# , #GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN# , #GIATRI_BIENLAI# , #GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN# , #GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN# , #GIATRI_THATTHU# , #MIENGIAM_TL# , #MIENGIAM_GIATRI# , #NGANSACH_TL# , #NGANSACH_GIATRI# , #TAITRO_TL# , #TAITRO_GIATRI# , #BHTN_TL# , #BHTN_DONGIA# , #BHTN_THANHTIEN# , #BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA# , #BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA# , #DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN# , #HUY# , #DATHANHTOAN# , #DATHUCHIEN# , #KHONGTHUTIEN# , #HOADON_ID# , #ACTIVE# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# )
statements.update:
update TT_VIENPHI set TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID# , BENHAN_ID = #BENHAN_ID# , REF_ID = #REF_ID# , REF_TABLE = #REF_TABLE# , DICHVU_ID = #DICHVU_ID# , DUOC_ID = #DUOC_ID# , LOAI_CHIPHI = #LOAI_CHIPHI# , LOAIGIA_ID = #LOAIGIA_ID# , SOLUONG = #SOLUONG# , DONGIA_DOANHTHU = #DONGIA_DOANHTHU# , THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU = #THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU# , BHYT_TL = #BHYT_TL# , BHYT_DONGIA = #BHYT_DONGIA# , BHYT_THANHTIEN = #BHYT_THANHTIEN# , BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA = #BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA# , BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = #BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA# , BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN = #BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN# , GIATRI_HOADON = #GIATRI_HOADON# , GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN = #GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN# , GIATRI_BIENLAI = #GIATRI_BIENLAI# , GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN = #GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN# , GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN = #GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN# , GIATRI_THATTHU = #GIATRI_THATTHU# , MIENGIAM_TL = #MIENGIAM_TL# , MIENGIAM_GIATRI = #MIENGIAM_GIATRI# , NGANSACH_TL = #NGANSACH_TL# , NGANSACH_GIATRI = #NGANSACH_GIATRI# , TAITRO_TL = #TAITRO_TL# , TAITRO_GIATRI = #TAITRO_GIATRI# , BHTN_TL = #BHTN_TL# , BHTN_DONGIA = #BHTN_DONGIA# , BHTN_THANHTIEN = #BHTN_THANHTIEN# , BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA = #BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA# , BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = #BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA# , DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN = #DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN# , HUY = #HUY# , DATHANHTOAN = #DATHANHTOAN# , DATHUCHIEN = #DATHUCHIEN# , KHONGTHUTIEN = #KHONGTHUTIEN# , HOADON_ID = #HOADON_ID# , ACTIVE = #ACTIVE#
, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where VIENPHI_ID = '$VIENPHI_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TT_VIENPHI where VIENPHI_ID = '$VIENPHI_ID$'

delete from TT_VIENPHI
TT_VIENPHI.VIENPHI_ID = '$VIENPHI_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.REF_ID = '$REF_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.REF_TABLE = '$REF_TABLE$'
TT_VIENPHI.DICHVU_ID = '$DICHVU_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.DUOC_ID = '$DUOC_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.LOAI_CHIPHI = '$LOAI_CHIPHI$'
TT_VIENPHI.LOAIGIA_ID = '$LOAIGIA_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.SOLUONG = '$SOLUONG$'
TT_VIENPHI.DONGIA_DOANHTHU = '$DONGIA_DOANHTHU$'
TT_VIENPHI.THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU = '$THANHTIEN_DOANHTHU$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHYT_TL = '$BHYT_TL$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHYT_DONGIA = '$BHYT_DONGIA$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHYT_THANHTIEN = '$BHYT_THANHTIEN$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA = '$BHYT_DONGIA_CHITRA$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = '$BHYT_THANHTIEN_CHITRA$'
TT_VIENPHI.BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN = '$BENHNHAN_PHAITHANHTOAN$'
TT_VIENPHI.GIATRI_HOADON = '$GIATRI_HOADON$'
TT_VIENPHI.GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN = '$GIATRI_HOADON_DATHANHTOAN$'
TT_VIENPHI.GIATRI_BIENLAI = '$GIATRI_BIENLAI$'
TT_VIENPHI.GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN = '$GIATRI_BIENLAI_DATHANHTOAN$'
TT_VIENPHI.GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN = '$GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN$'
TT_VIENPHI.GIATRI_THATTHU = '$GIATRI_THATTHU$'
TT_VIENPHI.MIENGIAM_TL = '$MIENGIAM_TL$'
TT_VIENPHI.MIENGIAM_GIATRI = '$MIENGIAM_GIATRI$'
TT_VIENPHI.NGANSACH_TL = '$NGANSACH_TL$'
TT_VIENPHI.NGANSACH_GIATRI = '$NGANSACH_GIATRI$'
TT_VIENPHI.TAITRO_TL = '$TAITRO_TL$'
TT_VIENPHI.TAITRO_GIATRI = '$TAITRO_GIATRI$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHTN_TL = '$BHTN_TL$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHTN_DONGIA = '$BHTN_DONGIA$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHTN_THANHTIEN = '$BHTN_THANHTIEN$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA = '$BHTN_DONGIA_CHITRA$'
TT_VIENPHI.BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA = '$BHTN_THANHTIEN_CHITRA$'
TT_VIENPHI.DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN = '$DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN$'
TT_VIENPHI.HUY = '$HUY$'
TT_VIENPHI.DATHANHTOAN = '$DATHANHTOAN$'
TT_VIENPHI.DATHUCHIEN = '$DATHUCHIEN$'
TT_VIENPHI.KHONGTHUTIEN = '$KHONGTHUTIEN$'
TT_VIENPHI.HOADON_ID = '$HOADON_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.ACTIVE = '$ACTIVE$'
TT_VIENPHI.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_VIENPHI.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
TT_VIENPHI.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'

SELECT DISTINCT D.DVYEUCAU_ID, D.DICHVU_ID, D.SOPHIEUYEUCAU, D.NGAYGIOYEUCAU, D.NOITHUCHIEN_ID, P.LOAIPHAUTHUAT, L.STT AS STT_LOAIPHAUTHUAT FROM TT_DVYEUCAU D left join TM_PHANLOAIPHAUTHUAT P ON D.DICHVU_ID = P.DICHVU_ID left join TM_LOAIPHAUTHUAT L ON L.LOAIPHAUTHUAT = P.LOAIPHAUTHUAT where D.DVYEUCAU_ID not in (select DVYEUCAU_ID from TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU)
#LISTDICHVU_ID[]#
D.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'

SELECT * FROM TT_BENHNHAN
BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
SELECT * FROM TT_VIENPHI WHERE REF_ID IN ($LIST_DVYEUCAU_ID$) and REF_TABLE='TT_DVYEUCAU' AND TIEPNHAN_ID = $TIEPNHAN_ID$
